name: cares
description: Monorepo for CARES web and mobile

scripts.build: npm run clean-lib --workspace=@cares/common && npm run build --workspace=cares-web-frontend
scripts.start:web: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.start:mobile: npm run clean-lib --workspace=@cares/common && npm run start --workspace=cares-mobile
